changeSet.author: Mbarek
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_TAX set UUID ='TAX-'|| id
update BILLING_CYCLE set UUID ='BillingCycle-'|| id

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE cat_offer_template SET TYPE='OFFER'

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CAT_PRODUCT_OFFER_TMPL_CAT (product_id, offer_template_cat_id, indx) SELECT id, cat_offer_template_cat_id, 0 FROM cat_offer_template WHERE cat_offer_template_cat_id IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: TyshanShi
TyshanShi
changeSet.sql: update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE where id =(select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'RecurringChargeTemplate_%' or a.code like 'OneShotChargeTemplate_%' or a.code like 'UsageChargeTemplate_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_INVOICE_CAT where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'InvoiceCategory_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_INVOICE_SUB_CAT where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'InvoiceSubCategory_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_TAX where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'Tax_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from CAT_PRICE_PLAN_MATRIX where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'PricePlanMatrix_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from ADM_TITLE where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as bigint) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'Title_%'
update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CLASS =(select substring(code,0, position('_' in code)) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id) where a.code like '%_%'
alter table ADM_MESSAGES drop column code

changeSet.author: pbach (generated)
AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ORD_ORDER set UUID ='ORDER-'|| id

changeSet.author: pbach
changeSet.sql: update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, ',', ',"') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, ')}', '")}') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, 'routedToUserGroup', 'routeToUserGroup') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

changeSet.author: pbach
changeSet.sql: update WF_TRANSITION set FROM_STATUS = 'ACKNOWLEDGED', TO_STATUS = 'IN_PROGRESS' where FROM_STATUS is NULL and TO_STATUS is NULL and WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF');

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.MeasurableQuantity' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.MeasurableQuantity'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.BarChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.BarChart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.Chart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.Chart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.LineChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.LineChart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.PieChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.PieChart'
